name: Grappling game prototype
description:
A short prototype created as practice for light environmental storytelling and player direction while implementing navigational grappling mechanics and usable items.

In the level the player arrives at a path leading into a city taken over nature. They have to use the grappling mechanic to traverse the canyon and use the items to grow more branches to grapple onto in order to reach the center of the area.

Made with Unity.
